structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations

law.text: A married woman shall not be liable for her husbandâ€™s debts, nor shall her property be liable to be taken on an execution against him. But a married woman shall be liable jointly with her husband for debts due, to the amount of one hundred dollars in each case, for necessaries furnished with her knowledge or consent to herself or her family, if she has property to the amount of two thousand dollars or more.
